name: Coney Island
overview: An arcade style action game with Educational elements published as part of "Early Learning Friends" game pack. Freezy appears at his ice cream stand in the North Pole waiting for customers. A customer walks over and orders and ice cream cone. Freezy jumps into the water and waits for you to guide him to the ice cream islands. Make sure you've looked at the ice cream order. How many scoops do you need, what flavors and in what order?
